jobs.title: Data Automation Intern
bullets: Maintained multi-tenant SQL demo environments and built reusable refresh scripts, reducing setup time by 40%.
Automated recurring financial data entry workflows using VBA/macros, improving accuracy and operational efficiency.
Documented technical issues and solutions to streamline knowledge transfer and reduce IT support requests.
Coordinated data-related tasks with internal teams using Agile methodology; participated in standups and sprint planning.

jobs.title: Automation Developer
bullets: Led the development of cross-functional projects involving product listing automation, inventory management, and pricing optimization across cloud environments.
Developed Python-based data pipelines with APIs and Selenium, resulting in 25% operational efficiency gains.
Managed backlog and release cycles using Kanban workflows; prioritized automation issues with cross-functional teams.
Refactored data-pipeline error handling with retry/back-off logic; reduced scrape failure rate from 8% to less than 1%.
